you can motte and bailey all you want, sexual content depicting prepubescent children is what's being discussed here. that's an easy line to draw imo.

drawn or no, there's plenty of evidence that its use intensifies rather than soothes pedophilic urges, which ends up harming real human beings

talk.author: did:plc:fdbks7ugpy5i6nweuhffho4b
talk.utter:
side note as a member of multiple marginalized groups it really chaps my ass that people who like jerking it to kids are constantly trying to frame their issues as "persecution" like our struggles are the same

people not liking your porn isn't oppression! get real problems!

talk.author: did:plc:32wf2tdbchgci235ycgkbxi3
talk.utter:
Well hold I will say it’s definitely a problem. Those that deal with this urge and who earnestly seek help, I truly sympathize with them, I can’t imagine having that kind of dangerous, horrifying tick in my brain. 

But this isn’t that case, obviously. I’m just saying as a general thing

talk.author: did:plc:fdbks7ugpy5i6nweuhffho4b
talk.utter:
oh for sure, fighting your own brain sucks and ideally everyone should have access to adequate treatment

i was speaking specifically in reference to their stuff being banned, getting flak for circulating pinups of 8 year olds is not equivalent to actual discrimination
